title: Ticket #803: condor_prio doesn't support -constraint
description:
condor_prio doesn't accept the -constraint option. It should.

Use case:

"I want all nodes associated with my DAG (job #97) to have a higher priority than all of my other jobs."

Expected command: condor_prio -p 10 -constraint 'DAGManJobId==97'

Actual command: condor_q -constraint 'DAGManJobId==97' | xargs condor_prio -p 10
